trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have done it! you have demonstrated your incredible bus driving skills and proven yourself to be a true prodigy in the virtual bus driving world. Your mastery of the roads, exceptional driving techniques, and comprehensive understanding of the game set you apart as a true master of the virtual roads.
Congratulations! You’ve successfully navigated through your first mission and completed the tutorial. You’re ready to hit the roads and make your mark on the world of bus simulation.
You’re off to a great start! You’ve driven a total of 5 km and are already making your presence felt on the roads. Keep up the good work!
Your first bus has been fully upgraded and is now ready for any challenge that comes your way. Whether you’re cruising through the city or tackling a steep mountain pass, you’re equipped for success.

You’ve made your first purchase from the bus shop and have acquired the trusty School Bus. This versatile vehicle is perfect for transporting students, tourists, and anyone else who needs a reliable ride.
You’ve conquered route number 4 and proved your skills as a bus driver. With each successful route completion, you’re earning a reputation as one of the best drivers in the simulation world.

Your bus has seen some wear and tear, but you’ve got the skills to get it back in tip-top shape. You’ve repaired a bus for the first time and are now ready to tackle any repair challenges that come your way.
You’ve reached a new milestone! You’ve driven a total of 10 km and are well on your way to becoming a seasoned bus driver. Keep up the good work!

You’ve made another purchase from the bus shop and have acquired the sleek and stylish AIAZ-52 bus. With its modern design and advanced features, this bus is perfect for city commutes and long-distance trips alike.
You’ve added another amazing bus to your collection with the INTERNATIONAL bus. This iconic vehicle is perfect for transporting tourists and is sure to turn heads wherever you go.
You’ve completed another challenging route and have earned the title of Route Connoisseur. You’re well on your way to becoming a master of the roads.

You’ve unlocked the free ride mode and are now free to explore the simulation world at your own pace. Drive through scenic landscapes, test your skills on challenging roads, and create your own adventure.
You’ve driven a total of 15 km in free ride mode and are now a true adventurer. Whether you’re exploring new territories or simply enjoying the ride, you’re making memories that will last a lifetime.

Your collection of buses is growing! You’ve purchased a total of 7 buses and are well on your way to becoming a bus collecting master. Keep adding to your collection and make your mark on the simulation world.
You’ve fully upgraded the School Bus and have turned this reliable vehicle into a powerhouse. Whether you’re transporting students or taking on a new challenge, the School Bus is ready for anything.
You’ve reached a new level of excellence in free ride mode. You’ve driven a total of 25 km and are now a true master of the roads. Keep up the good work!
Your love for the open road has led you to drive a total of 40 km in free ride mode. You’re a true road warrior and are making your mark on the simulation world.
Your collection of buses is growing at an impressive rate! You’ve purchased a total of 15 buses from the shop, and your fleet is now one of the largest and most diverse in the simulation world.
You’ve fully upgraded the IRIZAR 16 bus and have turned it into a true powerhouse. With its advanced features and exceptional performance, this bus is now a legend in the world of bus simulation.

You’ve been driving for 2 hours straight and have proven your skills and endurance as a bus driver. Whether you’re on a long-distance trip or simply enjoying the ride, you’re making your mark on the simulation world.
You’ve made your final purchase from the bus shop and have acquired the last bus in the simulation world. You now have the complete collection of buses and are a true master of bus simulation.
You've completed all mission in the game, and have proven your skills as a bus driver. You’re now a true legend in the world of bus simulation and will always be remembered for your achievements.
